name: Starly
flavorText:
They flock in great numbers.
Though small, they flap their
wings with great power.

previous.name: Empoleon
previous.flavorText:
The three horns that extend from
its beak attest to its power. The
leader has the biggest horns.

next.name: Staravia
next.flavorText:
It flies around forests and fields
in search of bug Pokémon.
It stays within a huge flock.

wings with great power.

pokemon.name: Staravia
pokemon.flavorText:
It flies around forests and fields

It stays within a huge flock.

pokemon.name: Staraptor
pokemon.flavorText:
It has a savage nature. It will
courageously challenge foes that
are much larger.
